title: Dandy★Maniac
original_name: ダンディ ★ マニアック
sinopse:
The "sexy love comedy" centers around JKs who, upon entering their emotional teen years, have begun taking an interest in boys. Chiame and her childhood friends Yako and Ayari start a "Male Research Club" to assertively study men through fieldwork.

(Source: ANN)

Included one-shot:
Volume 2: Namako no Susume
